Articles.Content:
Hey Everyone

I've only been playing KSP for a few weeks and started building a space station with the Mobile Processing Lab being part of it. Having it remote piloted and transferring a crew from another craft, in some places when right-clicking the Module it states there is no crew on board. But in other places there is crew inside.

Is this because the Lab is double sided or is it just a glitch in the game version. The Game Version I'm playing on is  1.4.2

King Regards Glock408

Welcome to the forums. My guess is that the crew that you put into it were not scientists? They have to be scientists.

 

Edited June 4, 2018 by bewing
you sure you are clicking on the module both times? you arent accidently clicking  a cupola on top of it or something?
